BuffData.DynamicTooltip: <titleLeft>Vault Breaker</titleLeft><mainText>Vi is preparing for a powerful punch.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>

SpellData.Description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

SpellData.DynamicTooltip:
Vault Breaker (@Level@)Level @Level@ [@Hotkey@]@Cost@ Mana@Cooldown@ sec CooldownCharges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward.

First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by 15% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds.

Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing @Effect1Amount@ (+@CharBonusPhysical@) to @Effect2Amount@ (+@f1@) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals 75% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.
